categories: Toddler and child neck gaiters and scarves
description: Made from 2-layers of highly breathable antimicrobial material, this bandana is a nice alternative to a standard mask.Highly breathable, double-layer material has an antimicrobial finish.Pocket for an optional filter.Machine washable.Can be worn as a neck gaiter too.Bendable nose bar offers a custom fit and reduces fogging with glasses.
name: Kombi Bandana - Youths
